segments.text: I notice the boy precariously perched on the stool, reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched so far that I worry he might tip over any second!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him is standing with her palm out, eagerly waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s a cute yet risky little operation they have going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel a pang of anxiety about the whole situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their laughter must surely be muffled by the sound of the overflowing water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only the woman knew what was happening right around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
